branchCategory.name: BP1000, Back Pressure Regulator for General Applications
branchCategory.description: The Series BP1000 regulator was designed for general use in a wide variety of applications. Available options include Hastelloyinternals for corrosion resistance, panel installation, and a variety of pressure gauges in psig/bar or MPa units.

breadCrumb.name: BP1000, Back Pressure Regulator for General Applications
